location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 152: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, acknowledges the receipt of Commodore John Patterson Porter's letter, which reported the arrival at Bushire of Porter's successor as Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf, Captain George Robinson. Kemball takes the opportunity to record his official testimony to the zeal, assiduity and discretion that Porter has displayed while in command of the Squadron.
